author: ptcox
body: Attempted to fix the multithreading incompatibilities in CSCDigitizer as listed by Chris Jones in 2014, Just about all these are replacing cout by LogVerbatim. At the same time I updated sample config files, and reorganized the debugging output of CSCGasCollisions (ready for studies of those simhits which do not lead to CSC digis - mainly low energy electrons that do not cross a CSC gas layer.) As part of this updating I also had to remove cout in the CSC Digis themselves - that pull request has already been accepted in 75X. I have thoroughly tested these updates in 732 but I have not been successful in running in a 75X IB - assert failure in calorimeter digitization, which of course has nothing to do with this pull request.
title: CSCDigitizer cout to MessageLogger and updates
